"Older Man": "Polite Lady"
"Young Lady"

"\"There's someone I want you to meet.\"
Harriet said to <%me>, as she invited them to
a small town located in Southern Cuent."

"It was one of the few places in Cuent that
was far enough from the kingdom and the
war to be labeled a \"backcountry\"."
"Oh! Lady Harriet, welcome home!"
"Everyone was worried when they heard about the attacks... We're glad that you're safe."

"Lady Harriet, you must be tired.
We'll prepare your quarters
immediately. Sir Varuna and guests
as well, please."
"Everyone's concern for me is greatly appreciated. However, I am fine. Thanks to everyone, we're in good health."
"I must show our visitors around. Please, do not mind us, and keep working hard on your duties."
"I'm sorry for the disturbance. This is our home, home of the Cuent Militia."
"There sure are a lot of people for a militia."

"They're people who couldn't sit by
and let themselves be ruled by
Lutz's tyranny."
"Lutz's first priority is the collection of Ephimera and the summoning of the Devil Castles."

"Regardless of people living there or
not, he continues to summon the Devil
Castles, one after the other.
He's no longer sane."
"Overuse of technology will lead themselves to ruin. I'm sure the same goes for Ephimera..."
"<%me>, the person who I want you to meet is inside."
"I'm coming in."
"Good grief... Just because you've knocked, it doesn't mean you can just waltz right in. It doesn't mean anything until you've waited for a reply."
"If I had waited, it would have been sunset by the time I got your reply."
"Heh, I wonder what day that would be."
"Hey!? That voice...!?"
"Oh, a visitor? I guess that means it's our last day to pay our tax?"

"How...!? Why and how
are you here...!?"
"1. Luther!?"
